name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: Police report: The cause of the accident was the accidental discharge of a gun at a shooting club

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting from the collapse of the gymnasium of Qiqihar No. 34 Middle School, let’s talk about why the public opinion handling of every emergency event can eventually become a public relations disaster for the government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 26, a new video from the hospital on the night of the Qiqihar Stadium collapse was released.
In the video, parents were asked not to see their children for the last time unless they signed, and asked their leaders "How old is your child?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The so-called rock city is not about rock, but about the right to interpret rock.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
During the Chengdu Universiade, some residents once again used temporary entry and exit passes

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the afternoon of July 27, the whole city of Chengdu was on alert.
There was a guard post every five steps and a sentry post every ten steps around the Third Ring Road

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 27, the road to Tianfu Square in Chengdu was closed.
A motorcade of foreign heads of state passed by, but I didn't recognize the national flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Mother of the victim of the Qiqihar Stadium collapse

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 27, Shanghai.
Citizens put down a bouquet of flowers on Qiqihar Road to mourn the victims of the Qiqihar Stadium collapse accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At 4pm, on the streets of Chengdu
A motorcade of foreign heads of state passed by

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 27, media reported that Lieutenant General Wu Guohua, former deputy commander of the Rocket Force, passed away on July 4.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Chengdu community notified that the road from the city to the opening ceremony of the Universiade will be closed tomorrow. Communities along the road require windows to be closed and no photography or video recording is allowed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 27, Guangzhou Demolition Office recruited personnel to distribute leaflets
Required to have a tough personality, sharp tongue preferred
Called the demolished households "reactionaries"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Friendly reminder, according to previous notice, radio control orders will be implemented in some areas of Chengdu from 0:00 to 24:00 on the 28th. 
Citizens in the area are requested to make living arrangements in advance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A poster posted at Nanchang West Station, "The Source of Civilization".
